tests.name: encode_empty_object
tests.comment: Encode empty JSON object to MessagePack (fixmap with 0 elements = 0x80)
tests.skipReason: CyberChef string input handling broken or operation returns JS objects

tests.name: encode_empty_array
tests.comment: Encode empty JSON array to MessagePack (fixarray with 0 elements = 0x90)
tests.skipReason: CyberChef string input handling broken or operation returns JS objects

tests.name: encode_simple_array
